alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Greeley County through 1045 PM MDT... At 1009 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Towner, or 17 miles west of Tribune, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and dime to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for west central Kansas.
